title: does the MMR system reward bad games???
body: the more you win the more your punished due to not main meta or global styled play?  and if you do win its because your lucky your team carried you and if you do barely carry good luck with the x100 difficulty  next game. currently due to this punishing system i feel like not taking games as seriously starting as brand jungle and stuff you know try something new because it rewards bad games due to more fun difficulty instead of LCS difficulty. in conclusion: this MMR system is not fun way of doing things. there should be a CAP when determining MMR in normals.
